masthead.title: Imagine the perfect way to administrate your repositories.
masthead.description: Extend the capabilities of your Github and Gitlab accounts by adding ONARA features to them.

section1.title: Invite your friends
section1.description: Invite your friends to the Onara app or easily import them from your GitHub or Gitlab repositories.

section2.title: Ð¡ommunicate
section2.description: Import friends from GitHub and chat with them in real time.

section3.title: Mobile device support
section3.description: You have the opportunity to download the application to your phone and be online in any place convenient for you.

preFooter.title: Reliable platform for collective decision
preFooter.description: Our platform provides a reliable and effective solution for collective decision-making. We enable individuals from diverse experiences to connect and contribute their unique perspectives.
